name: netitor
description: a pedagogical web based code editor for creative netizens in training

scripts.compile-css: echo 'module.exports = `' > src/css/main.js && cat node_modules/codemirror/lib/codemirror.css node_modules/codemirror/addon/hint/show-hint.css src/css/main.css >> src/css/main.js && echo '`' >> src/css/main.js
scripts.prebuild: npm run lint; npm run compile-css
